payload.sql:
SELECT t.oid, t.typname
FROM pg_type as t
WHERE t.typname IN ('int2', 'int4', 'int8', 'oid', 'float4', 'float8', 'numeric', 'bool', 'timestamp', 'timestamptz')
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT t.oid, t.typname, t.typelem, t.typdelim, t.typinput, r.rngsubtype, t.typtype, t.typbasetype
FROM pg_type as t
LEFT JOIN pg_range as r ON oid = rngtypid
WHERE
  t.typname IN ('int2', 'int4', 'int8', 'oid', 'float4', 'float8', 'text', 'varchar', 'char', 'name', 'bpchar', 'bool', 'bit', 'varbit', 'timestamptz', 'date', 'money', 'bytea', 'point', 'hstore', 'json', 'jsonb', 'cidr', 'inet', 'uuid', 'xml', 'tsvector', 'macaddr', 'citext', 'ltree', 'line', 'lseg', 'box', 'path', 'polygon', 'circle', 'time', 'timestamp', 'numeric', 'interval')
  OR t.typtype IN ('r', 'e', 'd')
  OR t.typinput = 'array_in(cstring,oid,integer)'::regprocedure
  OR t.typelem != 0
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT a.attname, format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
       pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid), a.attnotnull, a.atttypid, a.atttypmod,
       c.collname, col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum) AS comment
  FROM pg_attribute a
  LEFT JOIN pg_attrdef d ON a.attrelid = d.adrelid AND a.attnum = d.adnum
  LEFT JOIN pg_type t ON a.atttypid = t.oid
  LEFT JOIN pg_collation c ON a.attcollation = c.oid AND a.attcollation <> t.typcollation
 WHERE a.attrelid = '"purchase_data"'::regclass
   AND a.attnum > 0 AND NOT a.attisdropped
 ORDER BY a.attnum
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT a.attname
  FROM (
         SELECT indrelid, indkey, generate_subscripts(indkey, 1) idx
           FROM pg_index
          WHERE indrelid = '"purchase_order_data"'::regclass
            AND indisprimary
       ) i
  JOIN pg_attribute a
    ON a.attrelid = i.indrelid
   AND a.attnum = i.indkey[i.idx]
 ORDER BY i.idx
payload.name: SCHEMA

         SELECT indrelid, indkey, generate_subscripts(indkey, 1) idx
           FROM pg_index
          WHERE indrelid = '"purchase_divisions"'::regclass
            AND indisprimary
       ) i
  JOIN pg_attribute a
    ON a.attrelid = i.indrelid
   AND a.attnum = i.indkey[i.idx]
 ORDER BY i.idx

[1m[35m (3.5ms)[0m  [1m[34mSELECT purchase_divisions.purchase_division_long_name, supplier_masters.supplier_name,
          purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code, SUM(purchase_data.purchase_amount)  FROM "purchase_data" INNER JOIN "purchase_order_data" ON "purchase_order_data"."id" = "purchase_data"."purchase_order_datum_id" INNER JOIN "supplier_masters" ON "supplier_masters"."id" = "purchase_data"."supplier_id" INNER JOIN "purchase_divisions" ON "purchase_divisions"."id" = "purchase_data"."division_id" WHERE "purchase_data"."construction_datum_id" = $1 GROUP BY purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code, purchase_divisions.purchase_division_long_name, supplier_masters.supplier_name, 
          purchase_data.division_id ORDER BY purchase_data.division_id, purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code[0m  [["construction_datum_id", 2689]]

payload.sql:
SELECT purchase_divisions.purchase_division_long_name, supplier_masters.supplier_name,
          purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code, SUM(purchase_data.purchase_amount)  FROM "purchase_data" INNER JOIN "purchase_order_data" ON "purchase_order_data"."id" = "purchase_data"."purchase_order_datum_id" INNER JOIN "supplier_masters" ON "supplier_masters"."id" = "purchase_data"."supplier_id" INNER JOIN "purchase_divisions" ON "purchase_divisions"."id" = "purchase_data"."division_id" WHERE "purchase_data"."construction_datum_id" = $1 GROUP BY purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code, purchase_divisions.purchase_division_long_name, supplier_masters.supplier_name, 
          purchase_data.division_id ORDER BY purchase_data.division_id, purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code
